# currentPermissions

**Instance Property**

The currently granted permissions that have not expired.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var currentPermissions: Set<WKWebExtension.Permission> { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **grantedPermissions**: The currently granted permissions and their expiration dates.
